page.title: 08ARMED FORCES _ RAF STANMORE
page.content: RAF Stanmore is a large base which serves a large number of functions. It is not an airfield. Our interviews cocentrated on the work of the Supply Squadron, the Driving Section and on living conditions for service families on the base SUPPLY SQUADRON This organises supplies of all kinds for RAF bases throughout the world. Normal working hours are 0830 -1700, but longer in emergencies. Packing occupies most of the morning; distribution takes place in the afternoon. DRIVING SECTION This provides cars and drivers. Normal working hours are 0800-1700. ACCOMMODATION Personnel live in either barracks or quarters. All quarters are the same _ semi-detached with 3 bedrooms.
